features.name: Fix command suggestions to use full plugin prefix
features.description: Update all command suggestions in harness output to use the correct /claude-harness: prefix instead of shorthand /harness-
verification: All command suggestions in commands/*.md use /claude-harness: prefix
harness-start output shows correct command format
harness-feature output shows correct command format
harness-checkpoint output shows correct command format
harness-orchestrate output shows correct command format
